summary: The diff implements a comprehensive JeetWin website redesign covering navigation, hero carousel, category tabs, game cards, promotions, footer, and supporting hooks/data files. Most requirements are well-addressed. However, there are some gaps: the category tabs component uses categories from games.ts which has 'Live Casino' but no standalone 'Casino' tab as specified. Eight files were omitted from the diff including likely CSS/tailwind config files that would confirm full theme enforcement. The implementation appears largely complete with minor concerns.

missing_requirements.requirement: Category tabs should include a 'Casino' category label as specified
missing_requirements.reason: The categories array in games.ts includes 'Live Casino' but not a standalone 'Casino' tab. The spec explicitly lists 'Casino' as one of the required category tabs alongside Cricket, Football, Slots, Live Casino, Card Games, Lottery.

hallucinated_features.description: StatsBar section displaying player counts, winnings paid, live support and security stats
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify a stats or trust bar section between the hero and games sections.

hallucinated_features.description: WhyChooseUs section with a 6-feature grid about platform benefits
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify a Why Choose Us or platform features section anywhere in the layout requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Live ticker bar inside the navigation showing live betting updates
hallucinated_features.reason: A live sports data ticker was not requested and the build request explicitly lists live sports data or real-time odds feeds as a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication hooks including useInternetIdentity and useActor
hallucinated_features.reason: Real user authentication or Internet Identity login is explicitly listed as a non-goal in the build request.

hallucinated_features.description: Payment methods list in footer data including Visa, Mastercard, UPI, Paytm and others
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify displaying payment method logos or a payment methods section in the footer columns.
